AllowAirStarts.label: Always Air Start
AllowAirStarts.help: Always air start - set to 1 for shorter missions

DistanceFromPlayerFieldZone.label: Exclusion zone around player field
DistanceFromPlayerFieldZone.help: Distance (meters) from player field to exclude flights

DistanceToPlayerFieldOverrideOdds.label: Odds of overriding exclusion zone
DistanceToPlayerFieldOverrideOdds.help: Odds that a flight will be in the exclusion zone

EnemyFlightsToKeepMax.label: Max Enemy Flights
EnemyFlightsToKeepMax.help: Upper bound of enemy flights to keep

EnemyFlightsToKeepMin.label: Min Enemy Flights
EnemyFlightsToKeepMin.help: Lower bound of enemy flights to keep

AiFighterFlightsForGroundCampaignMax.label: Max Fighter Flights Per Side: Ground Campaigns
AiFighterFlightsForGroundCampaignMax.help: Max number of fighter flights per side when the player is not in a fighter squadron

AiFighterFlightsForFighterCampaignMax.label: Max Fighter Flights Per Side: Fighter Campaigns
AiFighterFlightsForFighterCampaignMax.help: Max number of fighter flights per side when the player is in a fighter squadron

AiAddidionalFighterFlightsForWestFrontCa.label: Max Additional Fighter Flights Western Front
AiAddidionalFighterFlightsForWestFrontCa.help: Almost all squadrons are fighter, so more fighter flights are needed on the Western front

EnemyPlanesMax.label: Max Enemy Planes
EnemyPlanesMax.help: Number of enemy planes spawned in a mission

FriendlyFlightsToKeepMax.label: Max Friendly Flights
FriendlyFlightsToKeepMax.help: Upper bound of friendly flights to keep

FriendlyFlightsToKeepMin.label: Min Friendly Flights
FriendlyFlightsToKeepMin.help: Lower bound of friendly flights to keep

FriendlyPlanesMax.label: Max Friendly Planes
FriendlyPlanesMax.help: Number of friendly planes spawned in a mission

GenerateClimbWP.label: Generate Climb WPs
GenerateClimbWP.help: Generate WPs to gain altitude - set to 1 for more climb WPs

InitialSquadronSearchRadius.label: Initial Squadron Search Radius
InitialSquadronSearchRadius.help: Initial radius to search for squadrons to include in mission (in meters)

IsEscortedOdds.label: Odds a mission is escorted
IsEscortedOdds.help: Odds of a bombing mission being escorted

MGSpacing.label: MG Spacing
MGSpacing.help: Space in meters between MG emplacements

MaxAmbientBalloons.label: Max Ambient Balloons
MaxAmbientBalloons.help: Max number of ambient balloons in a mission

MaxSquadronSearchRadius.label: Max Squadron Search Radius
MaxSquadronSearchRadius.help: Maximum radius to search for squadrons to include in mission (in meters)

MaxSmokeInMission.label: Maximum amount of smoke in mission
MaxSmokeInMission.help: Maximum number of smoke instances in a mission

MaxSmokeInArea.label: Maximum amount of smoke in an area
MaxSmokeInArea.help: Maximum number of smoke instances in a 3km radius

OddsOfAceFlying.label: Odds Of Ace Flying
OddsOfAceFlying.help: Odds that a historical ace in a squadron will be in a flight

PlaneDeleteEnemyDistance.label: Distance from enemy
PlaneDeleteEnemyDistance.help: Distance from enemy before a plane is deleted

PlaneDeletePlayerDistance.label: Distance from player
PlaneDeletePlayerDistance.help: Distance from player before a plane is deleted

RandomizePlanesPerSide.label: Randomize Planes Per Side
RandomizePlanesPerSide.help: Choose to randomize planes per side for more varied missions

SquadronGeneratesMissionOdds.label: Flight Generation Odds
SquadronGeneratesMissionOdds.help: Odds that a squadron generates a flight

TimeOnArtillerySpot.label: Artillery Spot Time
TimeOnArtillerySpot.help: Time in minutes to be on station for Artillery Spot

UseAmbientGroundUnits.label: Create random ground units in mission
UseAmbientGroundUnits.help: Set to 1 create random battles, vehicle convoys, trains, and AAA

UsePlaneDelete.label: Use plane deletion
UsePlaneDelete.help: Delete planes that are far away (performance)
